page.title: 03Commerce and Industry
page.content: Most of the people who live in Bradford-on-Avon do not actually work in the town, but those who do work in the town mainly work for, "Avon Rubber," the ping-pong/tennis ball factory, "Moulton Developments" (where a new type of bicycle was invented) and the printing works. "Avon Rubber," concentrate on making hoses and suspensions for the motor car industry. They also make millions of small rubber diaphragms which are put inside every aerosol can made in Europe. Most of the shops in Bradford are self owned and only two stores belong to a national chain of stores, "CO-OP," and "Spar." There is a high proportion of antique shops and estate agents.
